mapper.select: SELECT ASSET_CODE, ASSET_NAME, ASSET_TYPE, ASSET_SUBNAME, SUBASSET FROM ASSETMANAGE_T ORDER BY ASSET_CODE ASC

SELECT RESERVATION_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(START_DATETIME, 'HH24:MI') AS START_DATETIME, TO_CHAR(END_DATETIME, 'HH24:MI') AS END_DATETIME, REASON, EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, ASSET_CODE, ASSET_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_NUMBER DESC) AS RN, R.RESERVATION_NUMBER, R.START_DATETIME, R.END_DATETIME, R.REASON, E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, P.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME, A.ASSET_CODE, A.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSETRESERVATION_T R INNER JOIN EMP_T E ON R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE INNER JOIN ASSETMANAGE_T A ON R.ASSET_CODE = A.ASSET_CODE WHERE R.START_DATETIME = #{date}) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT RESERVATION_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(START_DATETIME, 'HH24:MI') AS START_DATETIME, TO_CHAR(END_DATETIME, 'HH24:MI') AS END_DATETIME, REASON, EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, ASSET_CODE, ASSET_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_NUMBER DESC) AS RN, R.RESERVATION_NUMBER, R.START_DATETIME, R.END_DATETIME, R.REASON, E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, P.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME, A.ASSET_CODE, A.ASSET_NAME FROM ASSETRESERVATION_T R INNER JOIN EMP_T E ON R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE INNER JOIN ASSETMANAGE_T A ON R.ASSET_CODE = A.ASSET_CODE WHERE R.START_DATETIME = #{date} AND E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
